title: Rebels of Jupiter
description: By the year 2589, Earth is nothing more than a desert, and twenty-seven-year-old Detective Darvin Mooray's heart is just as bare. He is haunted by the only unsolved case in his files, his father's murder. The colonies orbiting Jupiter are in open rebellion against the Earth Commonwealth. Darvin's assignment is to track down a missing General, who holds valuable information concerning the uprising. Amidst the body littered streets, he uncovers a conspiracy that will forever change his life. After finding those responsible for the chaos, and his father's downfall, Darvin must decide which is more important - humanity or personal revenge.
author: Russell Beideman
